## R as a calculator

Addition

```{r}
1 + 2
5 + 10
```

Multiplication

```{r}
2 * 2
3 * 2
```

Division

```{r}
6 / 2
9 / 3
```

Power

```{r}
5^2
2^3
```

We always put spaces around arithmetic operators such as `+, *, /`, but not `^`.
